1.content:
This story is about two girls in particular: Jazmin and Brielle, two best friends that are also their school's biggest bullies. All the chapters are going to be following these girls and their continued embarrassment, so here are descriptions of them:

Jazmin Murray - Jazmin is a short, tan, Latina bully with medium-length black hair and a curvy figure. Her breasts are slightly larger than average, but below that is her massive, wide, wobbling bubble butt that threatens to tear open the fabric of everything she wears, from her typical jeans to even skirts and dresses, on the rare occasion she wears them. She tries to give off a mean aura, usually furrowing her brow a bit, and dressing in dark colors and jeans, jackets, and other "tough" clothing. She does this to make up for the fact that her younger sister, Cindy, had been given full control of her choice in underwear after the administration at Grover High reported her bullying to her mother, Tara. As punishment, Cindy got to choose a plethora of embarrassing and humiliating underwear choices for Jazmin to wear, and her old underwear were thrown out. As such, Jazmin has to be more careful not to bully other girls in front of teachers, otherwise Tara will be informed, and her punishment will be even worse. As it stands, every Wednesday is Jazmin's "punishment night," where Tara takes her daughter over her knee for a half hour long spanking to make sure she keeps up with the good behavior. Jazmin has a deal with Cindy so that Cindy won't expose Jazmin's humiliating panties, as long as she also gets to toy with Jazmin's outfits when she dresses in the morning, which is humiliating, but Jazmin doesn't have much of a choice.

Brielle Williams - Brielle is a bit taller than her bestie, and quite a bit paler. She has less of a mean, tough face, and more a beautiful, princess-like pretty face, with flowing blonde hair going down to her back. Her breasts are slightly smaller than Jazmin's, but her big bubble butt is almost as big, though the girls did take measurements in a contest to determine whose bottom was bigger, much to Jazmin's embarrassment. While it is a bit smaller, it still pushes the boundaries of her clothing all the same, threatening to tear her jeans apart if she stretches them too much. Her wardrobe isn't too different from Jazmin's, albeit a bit brighter and slightly more colorful, but not so much to call her a girly-girl. This is because her panties, on the other hand, are as girly-girl as can be, with bright pinks and yellows, purples and blues, many of them with glitter or frills as well. She also has an entire drawer dedicated to panties with the word "Princess" on them. All of this because Brielle's older sister, Bonnie, is the acting head of the house, since Brielle's mother moved away for her job. Bonnie loves to bully Brielle and bring out the girly-girl in her younger sister, and as such forces Brielle to wear Bonnie's old panties, all of which are the embarrassing girly panties mentioned before.Though she hasn't exposed Brielle to any of her friends (yet), Brielle is still quite afraid of the day Bonnie decides to show her off..

Now come the choices for these two bullies' humiliation. Each chapter should be about both characters together, since they're best friends, but some chapters can be character-specific, though they shouldn't stay that way for very long. Here are options for their humiliating downfall:

#1: While doing something, one (or both) of the girl's pants rip at school, exposing their panties to someone nearby!

#2: Someone is nearby, and hears/sees the girls saying/doing something embarrassing, using it as blackmail!

#3: Someone steals one (or both) of the girl's phones and finds embarrassing evidence on them!

#4: One (or both) of the girl's sisters finally reveal humiliating information about them, whether on purpose or by accident!

11.content:
It was Skip Day at Grover High School, an unofficial holiday which almost all students participated in; a day most girls simply skipped school and took the day off for fun. The only girls who chose not to stay for Skip Day, were, of course, the biggest nerds and dorks in the whole school.

And Jazmin and Brielle.

After being recently exposed for bullying, Jazmin's mother, Tara, told her that she wasn't allowed to participate in Skip Day, and if she did participate, Tara would drag her out to the backyard to spank her. Needless to say, Jazmin chose not to participate. Brielle, on the other hand, was told by Bonnie that she couldn't participate. Of course, she refused and got into an argument with Bonnie, at the end of which Brielle was rubbing her freshly-spanked bottom through a pair of bright frilly panties.

So, neither girl could participate, instead choosing to tell their friends that they wanted to go to school that day to pick on the nerds that willingly showed up. Which was partially true; Jazmin and Brielle had been uploading pictures to their private accounts showing countless girls being wedgied, pantsed, swirlied, noogied, wet willied, and much more, throughout the day.

Brielle was wearing a tight black pair of skinny jeans and a gray long sleeve v-neck that hugged her figure well, and her hair tied up in a tight ponytail. On bottom, she was wearing a pair of embarrassingly tight leggings which continually gave her a natural wedgie, no matter how many times she awkwardly picked it.

The girls were heading to their fourth class of the day, just before their lunch hour. "Ugh," Jazmin groaned, looking at all the empty chairs. "Seriously, no nerds in this class today?" "Well, it is a super easy class, bubble butt," Brielle replied as they sat down, "I'm only here because you... 'persuaded' me into taking it," Brielle said, blushing as she remembered the atomic wedgie Jazmin often used to "persuade" Brielle. Jazmin simply giggled, also remembering that day, but perking up as someone walked through the door as the bell rang.

The girl was McKenna, one of the head students in the school's Newspaper and Yearbook Club. Her hair was a dirty blonde running down to her shoulders, a bit shorter than Jazmin's. Her frame was slender but curvy, with average sized breasts, a medium waist, and a nice round, bouncing bottom, of course not as big as Jazmin's or Brielle's. She was wearing a white t-shirt that had a camera lens on it, wire-frame glasses, and gray leggings. As soon as she saw that she was the only one in the room with Jazmin and Brielle, her eyes widened and she sat far away from them, blushing deeply, much to the two girls' amusement.

"Wow, I forgot she was even in this class!" Jazmin smiled, waving at McKenna. Brielle nodded, "Remember, last week we put that 'Wedgie Me!' sign on her back?" "Let's do that again," Jazmin giggled, getting out a piece of paper as the bell rang. "Ugh," she groaned, seeing the teacher walk in, foiling her plans.

"Wow, big turnout today!" The teacher, Ms. Conway smiled. "This must be my smallest class so far! Well, so far we've mostly just been doing fun little games, we even went into the gym last hour, do you guys wanna do that?" "Sure!" Jazmin smiled, happy to get out of work. "Do you think I could bring my camera? For Newspaper Club?" "Doesn't sound like a problem to me!" Ms. Conway smiled.

"Ugh, I hate the gym," Brielle groaned. "You hate the gym 'cause you're a dork who can't play sports," Jazmin teased, poking Brielle's jiggly booty through her jeans. "Sports are just boring! Maybe you played too many sports, that's why you have such a big booty," Brielle smirked back, giving Jazmin a quick spank. Jazmin almost retaliated with a wedgie, but saw McKenna pointing her camera at them. "What're you filming, nerd?"

The group of four walked into the gym, McKenna picking out the massive wedgie she just received. "Oh, I'm sorry girls, I have to take this call. I'll be right back, the balls are over there, feel free to play whatever you'd like," Ms. Conway smiled before briskly walking out the door to the gym and going out of sight. McKenna sat down near the bleachers with her camera, seemingly on her phone, not paying attention to the duo.

"Want me to teach you how to play volleyball or soccer, so you don't get completely embarrassed?" Jazmin smiled, grabbing a soccer ball from the rack and bouncing it between her hands. "I don't want to learn how to play sports, or how to get a big bubble butt like you," Brielle stuck out her tongue with a smile. "Your butt is almost as big as mine, okay? Plus, I heard Ellen might like girls who play soccer," Jazmin said in a sing-songy voice. "Fine." Brielle muttered, walking towards Jazmin.

"First thing's first. Before we do anything, we need to stretch. Can you touch your toes? No, down further, come on, down here, with me!" Jazmin directed. The two girls were standing right next to each other, facing the same direction. "Make your back come down with my back." "I'm trying!" Brielle whined, stretching down slowly. "Here, we'll just go quick, okay? 3, 2, 1, down!"

*RRRRRRRRRRIPPP*

The girl's eyes went wide as Jazmin felt her leggings easily tear open, and Brielle felt her jeans rip open from the seam, both girls now grabbing their own butts in a panic, standing up straight and feeling the massive tears exposing most of their big bottoms.

They turned their heads and gasped when they heard giggling from the bleachers, seeing McKenna pointing her camera right at them, taking multiple pictures as she laughed and pointed at them. "Hey!" Jazmin snapped, quickly marching over to the sitting girl with Brielle. "You better delete those right now, dork." McKenna smiled, wiping a tear from her eye and looking up at Jazmin, "Or what? These are already on my cloud, all I have to do is upload them."

As McKenna spoke, she turned the camera, showing a picture of the girls, looking at the camera, blushing deeply, their proportionately tiny hands grasping their wide booties, their pants exposing their panties. Jazmin was wearing a pair of white panties with big rainbows on them, while Brielle was wearing a pair of yellow panties with bright red hearts on them.

Jazmin and Brielle were speechless, blushing as they watched the embarrassing pictures begin to cycle. "I think it'd make a cute Newspaper cover photo. And background photo. And yearbook photo! It's still early in the year, we can still make you two 'Most likely to be made fun of'! Or maybe 'Biggest bubble butts'? Look at those things!" McKenna giggled, setting the camera down and standing up.

"We could just wedgie you until you delete them," Brielle said as the boxed McKenna in against the bleachers. "Ladies, ladies! I think we can come to an agreement. I won't share the pictures - or put them up anywhere that anyone but me can see them. IF you two agree to let ME bully YOU." She smiled, pointing at the two of them. "I won't tell anyone, and I won't show anyone, but you two can't bully me anymore, and when no one's around, I get to bully you."

The girls looked at each other. "But we can still wedgie you to keep up appearances?" McKenna groaned, "Ugh, fine. But keep it to a minimum, or-" "Yeah, you'll leak the pictures, we know..." "Nope! Or I'll give you the spanking of a lifetime!" McKenna giggled, taking her first slap to the girl's bottoms. "Wow, jiggly, too! You guys are going for all the awards!" She teased, gripping each girl's juicy butt with one hand and shaking them around.

"Say it again!" McKenna smiled, yanking up on Jazmin's panties, while Brielle stood next to her, both of them facing the wall with their hands on their heads. "I'm a dork!" Jazmin blushed, speaking to the wall, closing her eyes and wincing as her panties snapped down. "Now you, say it again!" "Ouch!" Brielle yelped as her yellow heart panties rocketed up her back as McKenna wedgied her. "I'm a nerd!"

"Faster now!" McKenna grinned, putting one hand on each girl's panties, "I'm a nerd!" "I'm a dork!" "I'm a nerd!" "I'm a dork!" "I'm a nerd!" "I'm a dork!" McKenna giggled, letting the panties and the girls relax for a moment. "And together, you are?" The girls yelped as McKenna jumped into the air with their panties, giving them massive wedgies as they responded, "We're bubble-butted losers!"

"Whew, these are really stretchy panties," McKenna commented, giving one last tug to each girl's panties before letting them pick their embarrassing wedgies. "Ugh," Jazmin groaned, "Are we done?" "Yeah, class is almost over," Brielle added, trying to pull the back of her jeans together unsuccessfully. "There's one more thing I want to do," McKenna grinned, picking up her camera.

Jazmin walked on screen "My name is Jazmin, and I'm a dork." Brielle followed her, "My name is Brielle, and I'm a nerd." Then, they spoke together, "And we just got wedgied by McKenna, because we're bubble butted losers." The girls blushed deeply as they spoke the words, turning to McKenna, "Are we done now? That's like the fifth time!" "Seriously, McKenna, isn't it enough?"

McKenna rolled her eyes, picking up her camera, "Okay, I guess that's fine. We're done! You two can go and... try to hide those big butts," she giggled as she gathered her things with the ringing bell. "Good luck, losers!" She called on her way out of the gym.

Jazmin smiled, panting slightly as she slowed down in her run, brushing stray hairs out of her face and re-tying her ponytail a bit tighter to contain them. Her long blonde hair was also tied into a ponytail.

"Wow, princess," Jazmin smirked, "you seriously need to exercise more." Brielle stuck her tongue out, catching her breath and replying, "maybe you can lecture me when you get better than a 'C' in Algebra, dork," she smirked as Jazmin rolled her eyes.

Gym was always a constant back and forth between the two girls, with Jazmin having played volleyball and soccer previously, and Brielle being much more studious, and less athletic than her best friend. Though they still had fun together, since most of their time in the gym was unsupervised, meaning they could bully as much as they wanted to without consequence.

Jazmin hastily turned around, hiding her big butt from sight to fix her shorts, where a sliver of pink was visible between her black shorts and her black shirt. It's not even that much bigger than yours," Jazmin groaned, giving Brielle a quick pants wedgie while everyone's attention was on the other group of girls.

"I guess you're kinda right," Brielle groaned, quickly fixing her shorts. "These things are like booty shorts!" She looked down at the black fabric. On both Jazmin and Brielle, the fabric clung tightly to the girl's legs, and very tightly around their wide, wobbling behinds. On other girls in the gym, it was decently tight, some more tight than others, while these two seemed as if they were about to burst under too much movement, which was only made more embarrassing by how the girls' bottoms bounced whenever they ran.

Soon enough, the bell rang, and Jazmin sighed, "Here we go, back to nerd classes. Are you happy?" She smiled up at Brielle who replied with a quick spank and, "Oh shut it, dork," as they walked back to the locker room.

Due to the girls' unfortunate underwear situation, they always had to make sure that they were the last ones in the locker room before they stripped to change. Luckily, they were able to do this by bullying the other girls.

"Owwwwieee, five, five!" Gabby whined, tapping out on a nearby locker as Jazmin bounced her in her panties for the fifth time. The short Latina giggled, dropping Gabby and waving over the next girl, laughing as she saw Brielle give some poor girl an atomic wedgie before sending her off.

Now go on!" She ordered, ushering Tori away with a spank.

Soon enough, the locker room was empty except for the two girls. They did a quick double-check, including just outside the doors, and nodded to each other. "Ugh! Stuck again? Can you help me out here, princess?" Jazmin groaned, trying to get her tight shorts over her big bottom without tearing them. "Seriously, bubble butt? How big is your butt?" She teased, walking over and helping to finally get them over Jazmin's wide bottom and down to her ankles. "Wow, pink panties, huh? Real tough, Jazmin," Brielle smirked, giving her friend a spank before standing up and taking her own shorts down.

"Oh, because white panties with 'Precious' written in cursive rainbow letters is so much tougher!" Jazmin scoffed, taking off her shirt to reveal her matching pink bra. "You know what color people think of when they think of tough girls?" Brielle smiled. "Pretty pink, just like your undies. Oh, look at that! Even your tushy's pink!" "Don't call it my 'tushy'!" She says I'm gonna be getting them until the end of the school year!" "But school just started!" "I know it did!"

Brielle huffed, taking her shirt off and stuffing it into her locker as well, "Sorry, bubble butt, that sucks. Maybe it'll make you feel better to know that last night, Bonnie gave me the biggest wedgie ever." "Ouch, another Bonnie wedgie?" Brielle nodded. Brielle sighed, hanging her head in defeat as Mikayla's fingers wrapped around her panties and yanked upwards, causing her to squeaky and whine pathetically as the white panties were tugged up her back. Both girls didn't have to speak to know what the other was thinking. That this was ridiculous, this was their washroom that other girls feared. No one came here of their own choice they were either dragged or summoned by Jazmin and Brielle. Both girls took a deep breath and opened the door. Inside they were greeted by a very smug Mikayla who was tapping her toe and checking her watch. "Hurry up losers we only have 10 minutes between classes and a lot to do," ordered Mikayla.

"Watch it," growled Jazmin, Or else-" "Or else, what?" Countered Mikayla. "Or else we'll wedgie you to kingdom come and break your phone," snarked Brielle. "What would that accomplish," laughed Mikayla, "I've saved the video in multiple places, I'm not stupid." Brielle and Jazmin backed down immediately.

"Good girls, now I have two things for you to do and only one of them involves a wedgie, so why don't you decide between yourselves who's getting it." Jazmin and Brielle quickly flipped a coin. Brielle cheered as she won and Jazmin scowled. "That's a shame I was really hoping for some revenge on Brielle, oh well. Get in the stall, wide-load." Jazmin grumbled as she went into the middle stall and then gasp as she was pushed to her knees by Mikayla. Jazmin groaned in relief as her wedgie was undone, only to gasp in pain as her stretched undies were yanked back up her sore crack. "Take a deep breath, loser, we're going for ten flushes and you know what I want to hear after each one, don't you?" Jazmin nodded, "good, Brielle, you're on camera duty.

"T-ten, I deserve this for being a loser," cried Jazmin as her head was yanked out of the toilet, her black hair plastered to her red face as Brielle and Mikayla laughed at her. "That was awesome, now we are just about out of time, but one thing left," Mikayla held out a black g-string to Brielle, "put this on. While I can't spill your secrets I can make you something that doesn't seem humiliating to others, but I know would humiliate you."

         Brielle stood in front of the bathroom mirror filming herself, with jazmin next to her, sticking out her nearly naked pale white booty. "Hey to all my followers, just wanted to remind you girls what a real bubble butt looks like," smarmed Brielle as she blew a kiss to the mirror and giving a little pout as Jazmin gleefully spanked her besties bubble butt, Brielle blushing as the camera caught every ripple before shaking it some more as Jazmin gave it a few small spanks. Mikayla watched an embarrassed Brielle upload it to her instagram "Okay you girls are free to go...for now, but don't forget your parting gifts."

Jazmin and Brielle left the washroom blushing in their new bottoms. Brielle was wearing pink booty shorts that barely covered her panties with "Juicy" on the back and Jazmin was wear yellow ones with "XXXL" on the back.
122.title: Mikayla texts the girls, and makes them do some...

choices: Someone finds Jazmin and Brielle on their pants-less walk!
Madison and Ellen invite the girls to hang out with them tonight!
Skip to tomorrow!
1222.content:
"Okay, I admit, that cover up story was pretty good, bubble butt," Brielle said as they entered Jazmin's house and dropped their backpacks to the floor. They had a very long day of awkwardly pulling their tight booty shorts out of their fat butts, trying to make sure their panties weren't showing in any way. Luckily, Jazmin had the idea to take the volleyball teams shorts and put a cover story on Instagram that the whole point was to mock the volleyball girls.

"I told you, maybe if you stop going to math competitions like a nerd and start actually being a bully, like me, you'd think of this stuff," Jazmin smirked confidently, dropping the smirk once she turned to see Cindy waiting for her. "Hey, big sis!" Cindy smirked brattily, walking towards Jazmin and casually throwing her arm over her shoulder, bending her over and dragging her fingers across Jazmin's head. "Ah! Cindyyyyy!" Jazmin whined, stamping her feet pathetically, blushing as Brielle giggled at her booty wobbling around in the tight yellow shorts. "What were you saying about being a bully?" Brielle teased.

Still giving Jazmin the humbling noogie, Cindy turned to Brielle. "What'd you say to my sister, blondie?" Brielle opened her mouth to respond, but Cindy was too quick, "Oh, by the way? I saw your panties sticking out of those cute shorts! They look good on you! They make you look like a real sissy," Cindy teased as Brielle gasped, instinctively clapping her small hands against her massive bottom, blushing as she felt it jiggle around from the impact. "Complete with those white panties, all you need is some thick glasses and you'll look like a real nerd!"

Brielle scoffed, blushing at the idea of Cindy, a freshman, calling her a nerd. "Shut up, twerp! Maybe Jazmin can't give you any wedgies, but I can still stuff you into your locker tomorrow!" Cindy smirked in response, quickly pulling Jazmin's shorts down to reveal her bright pink panties, pushing her over into the carpet and leaving the short Latina with her wobbling tushy high in the air. Cindy stepped towards Brielle with a smile. "Oh, yeah? I don't think so. Because I saw you walk into school this morning with your usual black jeans, trying to cover those humiliating panties you always wear." Brielle blushed, feeling herself shrink against Cindy's accusation. "So I know that someone bullied you into wearing these cute shorts." Cindy reached around Brielle, grabbing the waistband of the pink shorts and tugging upwards, wedging them nicely between Brielle's wide cheeks. "And I might just find out who did it. Are we clear?" Brielle pressed her lips together, nodding quickly, causing Cindy to let go of the elastic shorts. "Great!"

Brielle awkwardly picked her shorts out of her fat butt as Jazmin stood, pulling her shorts up to her own bubble booty. "Uh, did I say those could come up?" Jazmin scoffed, looking at her younger sister and whining, letting the shorts rest right beneath her big cheeks, letting her big tan booty wobble around in her pink panties. "No, it's fine. You want them up?" Jazmin shook her head, "No, Cindy, come on, please, nonono, don't-!" Jazmin let out a girly whine as Cindy firmly gripped the stretchy elastic and tugged upwards, giving Jazmin a firm wedgie with the bright yellow fabric.

"Now call yourself a dweeb with an extra large tushy," Cindy giggled as she continued to tug up on the stretchy shorts. "Oh, come on, CIndy!" Jazmin whined, rocking onto her tip-toes to try and escape the wedgie from her younger sister as Brielle looked on, laughing under her breath. "You know I hate the word tush-" Cindy interrupted her with a big tug, stretching the bright yellow up to her shoulders, "I don't care, I'm telling you to say it!" Jazmin whined, closing her eyes and mumbling something. "Say it louder, dork!" Cindy ordered, using her free hand to grip Jazmin's ear firmly, getting a whine from the tan shorty. "Fine! I'm a dweeb... with an extra large tushy," Jazmin's face flushed a deep red as she finished the sentence, only multiplied by her wedgie. "Sorry, what was that?" "Ugh! I'm a dweeb with an extra large tushy!" "One more time?" "I'm a dweeb with an extra large tushy!"

Brielle giggled loudly, knowing how much Jazmin hated referring to her bubble butt as a "tushy", covering her mouth and pointing as Cindy continued to wedgie her. After Jazmin had ridiculed herself to Cindy's satisfaction, she was let go with a loud thwap of the elastic waistband coming back down, her shorts all bunched up between her big cheeks, exposing her pink panties on either side. "Still laughing at my sister, blondie?" Brielle scoffed, "Wh- come on, you're giving her a wedgie! It's funny!" She gulped as CIndy began to walk towards her.

"Now say it!" Cindy ordered, tugging Brielle's white 'Precious' panties out of her shorts and high into the air, much to Jazmin's amusement. "I'm a fat-assed nerd!" Brielle whined, her back arched as Cindy pulled her hips upward with the force of the wedgie. "Again!" "I'm a fat-assed nerd!" "What are you?" "I am a fat-assed nerd!" Brielle cried out, her pale face a deep shade of red as she felt her big bottom shake around wildly with each tug from Cindy. "Are you going to stuff me into a locker tomorrow?" Brielle groaned, "No..." "And why not?" "Because I'm a fat-assed nerd?" She asked weakly, hanging her head as Cindy laughed, giving her an extra-hard tug, lifting her up into the air before letting her fall to the floor gracelessly.

"Now both of you, take those ridiculous shorts off," Cindy said casually, brushing her hair out of her face. The two girls looked at each other, slowly lowering the shorts down their thick legs, eventually getting them around their feet. Cindy snatched the shorts out of their hands, walking away. "Wait, Cindy!" Brielle called. "I need to walk home! I need to wear something!" Her hands instinctively slapped against her bubble butt once more, gripping her cushiony cheeks tightly, thinking fearfully of what might happen if someone saw her on the street with nothing to cover her wide bottom except the embarrassing white 'Precious!' panties.

"Don't worry!" Cindy called back, "Jazmin's gonna walk you home! You two will look cute together, walking with your big booties shaking around in those panties!" The girls once more made a nervous eye contact, both of them reaching back in a feeble attempt to cover their humiliating panty-clad bubble butts with their hands before hastily going up the stairs to Jazmin's room.

"So this is bad," Brielle muttered as they got into the room. "Are you forgetting something?" Jazmin smiled, opening the door to her bathroom. "Ugh, Jazmin, come on!" "No, I was serious! I think whatever Mikayla does to one of us should be done to the other, too! Which means you're getting ten swirlies, princess. You can either come willingly, or with your panties on your head. Your choice." Brielle slumped her shoulders, walking into the bathroom past a giggling Jazmin.

"Okay, okay!" Brielle gasped, water trickling down her face, "I'm a loser, I'm a loser!" She wiped her wet hair out of her face, groaning as Jazmin's laughter filled her ears. "You were right, princess, this is fun!" Jazmin smiled, helping Brielle stand and dry off before they both reconvened on Jazmin's bed. "Oh, look at this, princess," Jazmin said, pointing to her phone. "Ellen liked your 'bubble butt' post!" Brielle blushed deeply as she watched the footage of her booty being smacked by Jazmin play on repeat, her own voice ringing in her ears. "I guess she likes your fat butt. Maybe you have a shot with her after all!"

Brielle blushed, but began to smile as Jazmin's phone got a notification from Madison, a girl Jazmin had confessed to Brielle she had a crush on. "Hey, Jazmin. I really liked your post today about the volleyball girls. Especially the third picture." It was Jazmin's turn to blush as Brielle laughed loudly behind her. The third picture, of course, was a picture of Jazmin's big behind stretching out against the yellow fabric, even stretching the "XXXL" writing across her rear end. "Hey, it makes sense," Brielle smiled, "she's besties with Ellen, after all. I guess she likes your fat butt!" Brielle said mockingly.

"Thanks, it was really fun picking on those losers!" Jazmin typed out to Madison, blushing as Brielle laughed again. "Seriously? You sound like such a dweeb!" She laughed. "Next are you gonna say how comfortable the shorts felt on your butt?" "No!" Jazmin blushed, pulling her phone away from Brielle. "You know, Madison's a pretty good bully, too. Maybe she will date you, and she'll wedgie your big booty." "Shut up, princess!" "Madison and Jazmin sittin' in a tree! Madison gives Jazmin a huge wedgie!" Brielle teased, pushing Jazmin forward onto the bed and yanking her pink panties up to her shoulders.

"Owie! Quit it, Brielle!" Jazmin groaned, sitting up and pushing Brielle over, tugging up on the white panties and bouncing Brielle on the bed with a wedgie. "I bet Ellen's gonna write you a little love letter inside your locker, then she'll stuff you into it with your jeans at your ankles!" Jazmin smirked, pushing Brielle's head down into the bed and tugging on her panties, lifting her hips into the air. "Maybe she'll even go to your little mathlete competitions!"

Brielle blushed deeply, flustered as she sat up and got her hair out of her face. "Shut up! You know I only went to one mathlete competition!" "And you won, didn't you?" Jazmin teased, putting her hand on her forehead in the shape of an "L". "But that's okay! Maybe she can just buy you some of those dorky books instead!"

"The Venrath's Wand books are not dorky, and the extended collector's edition only double the price!" Brielle blushed as she realized what she was saying, deciding to shift focus, "Maybe Madison can come watch you cry when your mom spanks you!" Jazmin scoffed, "That was one time! And you promised you wouldn't bring it up!"

After a little while of bickering with each other, what happens to the best friends next?
1222.title: The girls spend the night at Jazmin's

info.brief_description: This interactive follows two girls who go from the biggest bullies to the biggest losers.
info.description:
This interactive is about two girls: Jazmin and Brielle, who attend Grover High School, and are considered to be the biggest, meanest bully that go there. But, their luck runs out, and soon they get to experience the bullying and humiliation they'd been dishing out for so long. There are just two ground rules for this story:

No males

No character under 18: even though it's a high school, this is fiction, so none of the characters mentioned should be children.

Other than that, be creative and have fun!
